title: Ep. 1029 - The "Alex Jones Was Right" Jar
description:
The EPA warns of two toxic chemicals in drinking water, USA Today deletes 23 fake news articles, and Rand Paul wrecks Dr. Fauci at a COVID hearing.

Watch our Summer blockbuster “Terror on the Prairie” with Gina Carano: https://utm.io/ueFOe  

Watch Matt Walsh’s new Daily Wire original documentary “What Is A Woman?” at whatisawoman.com, and pick up your copy of the “What Is A Woman?” book here: https://utm.io/ueFMe.  
 
Join us for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr 

—
